word: IN HER FIRST VISIONS THE LIVES OF THE PATRIARCHS, THE MISSION AND TEACHINGS OF CHRIST AND HIS APOSTLES, AND THE CONTROVERSY AS CARRIED FORWARD BY THE CHURCH OF CHRIST FROM THE ASCENSION TO OUR DAY WERE AT FIRST PRESENTED TO HER IN OUTLINE AND WERE WRITTEN OUT IN BRIEF, COMPREHENSIVE ARTICLES AS WE FIND THEM IN EARLY WRITINGS.
